screen.content:
<import src="https://admin.nanc.io/components/buttons/large_button"/>

<!-- ? ========================= DATA ========================= -->
<data id="colors"
      royalBlue="#5856E9"
      grey="#6C6C72"
      white="#FFFFFF"
      black="#222233"
      transparent="#00FFFFFF"
/>

<data id="stores"
      googleBadge="https://i.ibb.co/jTgHMnL/google-badge.png"
      appleBadge="https://i.ibb.co/HxcYZ3b/apple-badge.png"
      googleLink="https://google.com"
      appleLink="https://apple.com"
/>

<data id="fonts"
      main="Josefin Sans"
/>

<!-- ? ========================= TEMPLATES ========================= -->

<!--? BUTTONS-->
<template id="buttons.store">
  <stack>
    <image ref="{{ template.image }}"/>
    <positioned all="0">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="6"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.link }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="6"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.play">
  <stack>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="70" color="#9AFFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="60" color="#B4FFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <container size="50" color="#FFFFFF">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <positioned all="0">
      <center>
        <icon icon="mdi_play_box" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}"/>
      </center>
    </positioned>
    <sizedBox all="70">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.videoLink }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </sizedBox>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="buttons.icon">
  <stack>
    <padding all="8">
      <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" size="24" color="{{ data(colors).black }}"/>
    </padding>
    <positioned all="0">
      <material type="transparency">
        <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        <inkWell onPressed="browser: {{ template.link }}">
          <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
        </inkWell>
      </material>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<!--? TEXTS-->
<template id="text.h0">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="w700" size="31.25" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h1">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="bold" size="25" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h2">
  <text>
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" weight="w600" size="20" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<template id="text.h7">
  <text align="{{ template.align }}">
    <prop:textStyle color="{{ template.color }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5"/>
    {{ template.text }}
  </text>
</template>

<!--? CARDS-->
<template id="cards.bullet">
  <container>
    <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
      <prop:shadow color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" blurRadius="12" spreadRadius="-10"/>
      <prop:borderRadius all="10"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding all="20">
      <row crossAxisAlignment="start">
        <padding top="4">
          <container width="20" height="20">
            <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
              <prop:borderRadius all="100"/>
            </prop:decoration>
            <center>
              <icon icon="mdi_check_bold" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" size="12"/>
            </center>
          </container>
        </padding>
        <divider width="18"/>
        <expanded>
          <column crossAxisAlignment="start">
            <component id="text.h2" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="{{ template.title }}"/>
            <divider height="4"/>
            <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="{{ template.text }}"/>
          </column>
        </expanded>
      </row>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.feature">
  <column>
    <padding bottom="32">
      <center>
        <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" size="45" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
      </center>
    </padding>
    <padding bottom="18">
      <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" text="{{ template.title }}"/>
    </padding>
    <padding left="40" right="40">
      <text align="center">
        <prop:textStyle color="{{ data(colors).white }}" font="{{ data(fonts).main }}" size="16" height="1.5"/>
        {{ template.text }}
      </text>
    </padding>
  </column>
</template>

<template id="cards.metric">
  <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
    <prop:decoration>
      <prop:borderRadius all="8"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding all="12">
      <column crossAxisAlign="center" mainAxisSize="min">
        <padding bottom="12">
          <icon icon="{{ template.icon }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="8">
          <component id="text.h2" text="{{ template.numbers }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
        </padding>
        <component id="text.h7" text="{{ template.text }}" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
      </column>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<template id="cards.ellipse">
  <fractionalTranslation dx="0" dy="0.35">
    <scale scaleX="1" scaleY="0.25">
      <container height="260" width="300" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
        <prop:decoration>
          <prop:borderRadius all="500"/>
          <prop:shadow color="#805F5F5F" blurRadius="16" spreadRadius="-20" offsetX="16"/>
          <prop:shadow color="#805F5F5F" blurRadius="16" spreadRadius="-20" offsetX="-16"/>
        </prop:decoration>
      </container>
    </scale>
  </fractionalTranslation>
</template>

<template id="cards.dev">
  <container color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
    <prop:decoration>
      <prop:borderRadius all="12"/>
      <prop:shadow color="{{ data(colors).black }}" blurRadius="12" spreadRadius="-10"/>
    </prop:decoration>
    <padding left="20" top="40" right="20" bottom="40">
      <column mainAxisSize="min">
        <stack>
          <container size="220" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
            <prop:decoration>
              <prop:borderRadius all="200"/>
            </prop:decoration>
          </container>
          <positioned all="0">
            <center>
              <container size="214" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
                <prop:decoration>
                  <prop:borderRadius all="200"/>
                </prop:decoration>
              </container>
            </center>
          </positioned>
          <positioned all="0">
            <center>
              <sizedBox all="200">
                <clipRRect all="100">
                  <image ref="{{ template.image }}"/>
                </clipRRect>
              </sizedBox>
            </center>
          </positioned>
        </stack>
        <padding top="66">
          <component id="text.h0" text="{{ template.name }}" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="14">
          <component id="text.h2" text="{{ template.role }}" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <padding bottom="30">
          <component id="text.h7" text="{{ template.description }}" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"/>
        </padding>
        <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceBetween">
          <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_facebook_fill" link="{{ template.fb }}"/>

          <component id="divider.line"/>

          <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_instagram_fill" link="{{ template.inst }}"/>

          <component id="divider.line"/>

          <component id="buttons.icon" icon="mdi_twitter" link="{{ template.tw }}"/>

          <component id="divider.line"/>

          <component id="buttons.icon" icon="rmx_youtube_fill" link="{{ template.ytb }}"/>
        </row>
      </column>
    </padding>
  </container>
</template>

<!--? OTHER-->
<template id="slider.dot">
  <stack>
    <sizedBox all="22">
    </sizedBox>

    <show show="{{ template.active }}">
      <positioned all="0">
        <align align="center">
          <container width="22" height="22" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
            <prop:decoration>
              <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
            </prop:decoration>
          </container>
        </align>
      </positioned>
    </show>

    <positioned all="0">
      <align align="center">
        <container width="20" height="20" color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </align>
    </positioned>

    <positioned all="0">
      <align align="center">
        <container width="16" height="16" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
          <prop:decoration>
            <prop:borderRadius all="50"/>
          </prop:decoration>
        </container>
      </align>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</template>

<template id="divider.line">
  <container width="1" height="23" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}">
  </container>
</template>

<!-- ? ========================= UI ========================= -->
<sizedBox height="1227">
  <stack fit="expand">
    <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/bHnwdQc/app-background-1.png" fit="fitHeight"/>
    <positioned left="16" top="188" right="16">
      <column>
        <stack>
          <positioned left="20" top="0" right="0" bottom="0">
            <container color="#7472FE">
              <padding all="10">
                <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
                </container>
              </padding>
            </container>
          </positioned>
          <padding top="20" right="20" bottom="20">
            <container>
              <prop:decoration color="{{ data(colors).white }}">
              </prop:decoration>
              <prop:padding left="18" top="30" bottom="30" right="18"/>
              <column crossAxisAlignment="start">
                <component id="text.h1" text="A GREAT APP MAKES YOUR LIFE BETTER v2" color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}"/>
                <divider height="18"/>
                <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Velit officia consequat duis enim velit mollit."/>
                <divider height="30"/>
                <component id="text.h2" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="DOWNLOAD APP NOW"/>
                <divider height="18"/>
                <row>
                  <expanded>
                    <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).googleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).googleBadge }}"/>
                  </expanded>
                  <divider width="12"/>
                  <expanded>
                    <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).appleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).appleBadge }}"/>
                  </expanded>
                </row>
              </column>
            </container>
          </padding>
        </stack>
        <padding left="55" right="55" top="40">
          <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/YRH1DYW/app-screen-1.png"/>
        </padding>
      </column>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</sizedBox>

<padding top="60" bottom="18">
  <center>
    <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="ABOUT OUR APP"/>
  </center>
</padding>

<padding left="38" right="38" bottom="40">
  <center>
    <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae."/>
  </center>
</padding>

<padding left="68" right="68" bottom="40">
  <stack>
    <positioned left="0" right="0" bottom="0">
      <align alignment="bottomCenter">
        <component id="cards.ellipse"/>
      </align>
    </positioned>
    <padding left="20" bottom="35" right="20">
      <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/ZxkdMcb/mock-image-2.png"/>
    </padding>
  </stack>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="20">
  <component id="cards.bullet"
             title="Creative design"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
  />
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="20">
  <component id="cards.bullet"
             title="Easy to use"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
  />
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="92">
  <component id="cards.bullet"
             title="Best user experince"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
  />
</padding>

<container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
  <padding top="60" bottom="18">
    <center>
      <component id="text.h1" text="APP FEATURES" color="{{ data(colors).white }}"/>
    </center>
  </padding>
  <padding left="40" right="40" bottom="32">
    <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
               text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae."/>
  </padding>
  <padding bottom="32">
    <component id="cards.feature"
               title="FULL FREE CHAT"
               text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
               icon="mdi_message_bulleted"/>
  </padding>
  <padding bottom="32">
    <component id="cards.feature"
               title="UNLIMITED FEATURES"
               text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
               icon="flu_gift_filled"/>
  </padding>
  <padding bottom="60">
    <component id="cards.feature"
               title="AWESOME UI DESIGN"
               text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit."
               icon="flu_design_ideas_filled"/>
  </padding>

  <padding left="60" right="60" bottom="120">
    <physicalModel elevation="12" shadowColor="#80000000">
      <prop:borderRadius all="32"/>
      <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/MV1Cs8N/app-screen-2.png"/>
    </physicalModel>
  </padding>
</container>

<padding top="60" bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" text="CHECKOUT OUR APP INTERFACE LOOK" align="center"/>
</padding>

<padding left="40" right="40" bottom="40">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae."/>
</padding>

<padding bottom="40">
  <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/HdW9jTj/app-screenshots.png"/>
</padding>

<padding bottom="60">
  <row mainAxisSize="min" mainAxisAlignment="center">
    <component id="slider.dot"/>
    <divider width="16"/>

    <component id="slider.dot"/>
    <divider width="16"/>

    <component id="slider.dot" active="true"/>
    <divider width="16"/>

    <component id="slider.dot"/>
    <divider width="16"/>

    <component id="slider.dot"/>
  </row>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="90" bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" text="DOWNLOAD APP NOW" color="{{ data(colors).black }}"/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="40">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae. Est tellus vitae, nullam lobortis enim."/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="60">
  <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceBetween">
    <expanded>
      <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).googleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).googleBadge }}"/>
    </expanded>
    <divider width="25"/>
    <expanded>
      <component id="buttons.store" link="{{ data(stores).appleLink }}" image="{{ data(stores).appleBadge }}"/>
    </expanded>
  </row>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16">
  <row mainAxisAlignment="spaceBetween">
    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="59865" text="Download" icon="mdi_download_box"/>
    </expanded>

    <divider width="16"/>

    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="29852" text="Like" icon="flu_thumb_like_filled"/>
    </expanded>

    <divider width="16"/>

    <expanded>
      <component id="cards.metric" numbers="1500" text="5 Stars" icon="flu_star_emphasis_filled"/>
    </expanded>
  </row>
</padding>

<padding left="20" top="60" right="20" bottom="60">
  <stack>
    <positioned left="0" right="0" bottom="0">
      <align alignment="bottomCenter">
        <component id="cards.ellipse"/>
      </align>
    </positioned>
    <padding left="20" bottom="35" right="20">
      <image ref="https://i.ibb.co/0mdDcKW/app-screenshots-2.png"/>
    </padding>
  </stack>
</padding>

<padding bottom="60">
  <stack>
    <padding bottom="74">
      <container color="{{ data(colors).royalBlue }}">
        <column>
          <padding top="60" bottom="40">
            <component id="text.h1" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
                       text="HOW TO USE THE APP PERFECTLY"/>
          </padding>
          <padding left="40" right="40" bottom="120">
            <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).white }}" align="center"
                       text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae."/>
          </padding>
        </column>
      </container>
    </padding>
    <positioned left="0" bottom="0" right="0">
      <padding left="16" right="16">
        <physicalModel elevation="16">
          <sizedBox height="150">
            <clipRRect all="12">
              <stack fit="expand">
                <image ref="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hpgkrUPRBjc/hqdefault.jpg" fit="fitWidth"/>
                <positioned all="0">
                  <container color="#665856E9">
                  </container>
                </positioned>
                <positioned all="0">
                  <center>
                    <component id="buttons.play" videoLink="https://youtu.be/hpgkrUPRBjc"/>
                  </center>
                </positioned>
              </stack>
            </clipRRect>
          </sizedBox>
        </physicalModel>
      </padding>
    </positioned>
  </stack>
</padding>

<padding bottom="18">
  <component id="text.h1" text="OUR REACTIVE TEAM" color="{{ data(colors).black }}" align="center"/>
</padding>

<padding left="40" right="40" bottom="40">
  <component id="text.h7" color="{{ data(colors).grey }}" align="center"
             text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae."/>
</padding>

<padding left="16" right="16" bottom="60">
  <column mainAxisSize="min">
    <padding bottom="30">
      <component id="cards.dev"
                 role="APP DEVELOPER"
                 name="CARLA PRESS"
                 image="https://i.pravatar.cc/200?u=CARLA+PRES"
                 description="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae. Est tellus vitae."
                 fb="https://fb.com"
                 inst="https://instagram.com"
                 tw="https://tw.com"
                 ytb="https://youtube.com"
      />
    </padding>

    <padding bottom="30">
      <component id="cards.dev"
                 role="UI/UX DESIGNER"
                 name="CRAIG GOUSE"
                 image="https://i.pravatar.cc/200?u=CRAIG"
                 description="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae. Est tellus vitae."
                 fb="https://fb.com"
                 inst="https://instagram.com"
                 tw="https://tw.com"
                 ytb="https://youtube.com"
      />
    </padding>

    <component id="cards.dev"
               role="WEBSITE DEVELOPER"
               name="JOCELYN SEPTIMUS"
               image="https://i.pravatar.cc/200?u=JOCELYN+S"
               description="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Viverra nunc ante velit vitae. Est tellus vitae."
               fb="https://fb.com"
               inst="https://instagram.com"
               tw="https://tw.com"
               ytb="https://youtube.com"
    />
  </column>
</padding>
